mapper.sql: ttlq_id, djxh, ttlq_sssq_q, ttlq_sssq_z, ttlq_lpbm, ttlq_bnljs, ttlq_bys, ttlq_ewbhxh, ttlq_hmc, ttlq_lrr_dm, ttlq_lrrq, ttlq_sjgsdq, ttlq_sjtb_sj, ttlq_uuid, ttlq_xgr_dm, ttlq_xgrq, ttlq_zlbscjuuid, creatorid, createtime, updatorid, updatetime
mapper.insert: insert into t_tax_lrb_qykjzd (ttlq_id, djxh, ttlq_sssq_q, ttlq_sssq_z, ttlq_lpbm, ttlq_bnljs, ttlq_bys, ttlq_ewbhxh, ttlq_hmc, ttlq_lrr_dm, ttlq_lrrq, ttlq_sjgsdq, ttlq_sjtb_sj, ttlq_uuid, ttlq_xgr_dm, ttlq_xgrq, ttlq_zlbscjuuid, creatorid, createtime, updatorid, updatetime ) values (#{id}, #{djxh}, #{ttlqSssqQ}, #{ttlqSssqZ}, #{ttlqLpbm}, #{ttlqBnljs}, #{ttlqBys}, #{ttlqEwbhxh}, #{ttlqHmc}, #{ttlqLrrDm}, #{ttlqLrrq}, #{ttlqSjgsdq}, #{ttlqSjtbSj}, #{ttlqUuid}, #{ttlqXgrDm}, #{ttlqXgrq}, #{ttlqZlbscjuuid}, #{creatorid}, #{createtime}, #{updatorid}, #{updatetime} )
mapper.update: update t_tax_lrb_qykjzd set djxh = #{djxh}, ttlq_sssq_q = #{ttlqSssqQ}, ttlq_sssq_z = #{ttlqSssqZ}, ttlq_lpbm = #{ttlqLpbm}, ttlq_bnljs = #{ttlqBnljs}, ttlq_bys = #{ttlqBys}, ttlq_ewbhxh = #{ttlqEwbhxh}, ttlq_hmc = #{ttlqHmc}, ttlq_lrr_dm = #{ttlqLrrDm}, ttlq_lrrq = #{ttlqLrrq}, ttlq_sjgsdq = #{ttlqSjgsdq}, ttlq_sjtb_sj = #{ttlqSjtbSj}, ttlq_uuid = #{ttlqUuid}, ttlq_xgr_dm = #{ttlqXgrDm}, ttlq_xgrq = #{ttlqXgrq}, ttlq_zlbscjuuid = #{ttlqZlbscjuuid}, creatorid = #{creatorid}, createtime = #{createtime}, updatorid = #{updatorid}, updatetime = now() where ttlq_id = #{id}
